issue.title: Some headers ( ModelDatabase.hh ) are not exported when compiling from source v.2.2

content.raw:
```
$ dpkg -l | grep '^ii  gazebo'
ii  gazebo-current                             2.2.1-1~raring                             amd64        Gazebo simulator - Main package
```
```
$ ls /usr/include/gazebo-*/gazebo/common/
Animation.hh      CommonTypes.hh  Mesh.hh               SphericalCoordinates.hh
Assert.hh         Console.hh      MeshLoader.hh         STLLoader.hh
AudioDecoder.hh   Event.hh        MeshManager.hh        SystemPaths.hh
Base64.hh         Events.hh       MouseEvent.hh         Time.hh
BVHLoader.hh      Exception.hh    PID.hh                Timer.hh
ColladaLoader.hh  Image.hh        Plugin.hh             UpdateInfo.hh
Color.hh          KeyEvent.hh     SingletonT.hh         Video.hh
common.hh         KeyFrame.hh     SkeletonAnimation.hh
CommonIface.hh    Material.hh     Skeleton.hh

```
And the one installed from source (with ubuntu 12.04 and gazebo 2.2.1) has  an extra one:
```
MeshCSG.hh
```
content.html:
$ dpkg -l | grep '^ii  gazebo'
ii  gazebo-current                             2.2.1-1~raring                             amd64        Gazebo simulator - Main package

$ ls /usr/include/gazebo-*/gazebo/common/
Animation.hh      CommonTypes.hh  Mesh.hh               SphericalCoordinates.hh
Assert.hh         Console.hh      MeshLoader.hh         STLLoader.hh
AudioDecoder.hh   Event.hh        MeshManager.hh        SystemPaths.hh
Base64.hh         Events.hh       MouseEvent.hh         Time.hh
BVHLoader.hh      Exception.hh    PID.hh                Timer.hh
ColladaLoader.hh  Image.hh        Plugin.hh             UpdateInfo.hh
Color.hh          KeyEvent.hh     SingletonT.hh         Video.hh
common.hh         KeyFrame.hh     SkeletonAnimation.hh
CommonIface.hh    Material.hh     Skeleton.hh

And the one installed from source (with ubuntu 12.04 and gazebo 2.2.1) has an extra one:

MeshCSG.hh
